document.title: SSA-354910: SMBv1 Vulnerabilities in syngo  Multimodality

notes.title: Summary
notes.text:
syngo® Multimodality Workplace (MMWP) products from Siemens Healthineers products are
affected by the Microsoft Windows SMBv1 vulnerabilities. The exploitability of the
vulnerabilities depends on the actual configuration and deployment environment of each
product.
Siemens provides updates for the affected products and recommends specific
countermeasures until patches can be applied.
AFFECTED PRODUCTS
·syngo  Multimodality Workplace (MMWP): All versions without SY031/17/S
DESCRIPTION
Siemens Healthineers syngo  Multimodality Workplace (MMWP) products are intended to be
used for viewing, manipulation, communication, and storage of medical images and data on
exchange media.
Detailed information about the vulnerabilities is provided below.
